response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $1,500,000. As the exclusive seller, I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible deal while allowing me to maximize the value of my product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
